content: **knitted top/crop-top in drops paris the piece is worked bottom up in stocking stitch with i-cord edges sizes s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-885 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 250-250-250-300-300-350 g colour 72 parrot green **needles** drops single pointed needles size 5 mm drops single pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
